name: AVENGERS-USERBOT
description: A simple Telegram userbot based on Telethon . Maintained by MONUMISHRA_07

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 telesetup.py locally or https://replit.com/@JakuJaka/Ultimate#main.py

TG_BOT_USERNAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the username of your bot

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot.Worth it. Get it.

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: Set this one with only one the symbol to use it before your command to run like . , ' `

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: create a private channel and then type .get_id add that value here for save messages

PM_PERMIT_GROUP_ID.description: Put an Group Id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID Required For Pmpermit plugin.

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: for login private messages create a private channel and do .get_id and add that id

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Channel Where You Save Your Plugins

SUDO_USERS.description: Users you want to give access to your bot. (Don't allow unknown people)

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: Same value as PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID. Required for pmpermit.

MAX_FLOOD_IN_PMS.description: Number of messages you want before block

CUSTOM_PMPERMIT_TEXT.description: The text which you want in your pm permit message

CUSTOM_ALIVE_TEXT.description: your custom text which u want in alive

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Required for OCR functionality. Get from https://ocr.space/ocrapi

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Required for Removing image background functionality. Get from https://www.remove.bg/

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Required for updating the bot and other stuff get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: Leave as Ultimate if you need custom deploy then type your git repo link
